values: we have 2 new guest artists! Carlos & Mauricio have come from Mexico City, and are working with us at Steel Temple! theyve come here for a working vacation, while Carlos' #1 shop in Mexico City is run by other artists. you can read their mini writeup on our website here. Carlos' tattoo gallery is here, where you can see the portrait done on wolfs leg tonight. Carlos specializes in black & grey, including portraiture & biomechanical. Mauricio [he likes to be called 'weasel'] is his apprentice, and has been tattooing 2 years. Their shop website is here. we are very fortunate to have these two gentlemen with us during the first half of our busy season! appointments are filling up fast! Some examples of work found on the gallery: original image: half werewolf, half tattooistwolf portrait: x-posted. not sorry.

*SALE* AS OF NOW, ALL STANDARD CBR/HOOP PIERCINGS ARE PRICED AT $25, ALL STANDARD BARBELL PIERCINGS ARE PRICED AT $35. ADDITONAL JEWELS ARE $10.

We've found ourselves a new wholesaler, so we're passing the savings on to you. All piercings are done with top quality 316LVM surgical implantation steel. Prices are all-inclusive [jewelry, piercing & taxes included]. For a limited time only.

well smellier nicole *sticks out tongue.. haha  
you got to see my backpack ..so envy away !!  hahahaha 
bat day was cool  they said there was over 1000 goths and rockabillies there in disneyland . but i would say more like 300 .. or so give or take  more ghouls than guys .. some pretty cool clothes .. you know you all should share where you shop .. for all the  ones who envy you .
there was a wedding in front of the haunted mansion.
it was cool lots of yelling and cheering .. but the  but the guy that was performing the ceremony  was swearing  a little too much i think   i mean there is a lot of little kids there
it was cool to see all the goths of all ages   some were even in their sixties .. and there was whole families of goths .. even little baby goths ..
all in all it was a good time .. a little to hot to wear all black but i managed ..  i would post some pics of it but none of the night time pics turned out to well.. apparently there is another gathering .. for halloween aprox two weeks before halloween .. disneyland and knotts berry farm  decorate the whole place out pretty good i hear .. except they change the name to knotts scary farm ..its only a few miles down the road from disneyland . well thats it for now .. ps nicoles short ..hahahaha

what ever happened to keeping our history alive .. what really pisses me off is that all the cities and towns are removing all the standing headstones and tombs or crypts, in graveyards and are replacing them with those discrete headstones or plaques that lay flat on the ground and cant be seen  .. they think it looks better!  i think it sucks! .. it sucks bad!!  it takes away from the historical look of some old graveyards, and come all hallows eve it takes away from the way graveyards are supposed to look and have always looked... and have been seen in movies and described in stories .. soon thats all there will be left .. is what they look like in movies .. or some fictitious book .. i am very passionate about this .. i dont know i guess i am strange  but i have always loved graveyards .. ya they are spooky and creepy and  stuff but in a good way! i think they are very beautiful and mysterious .. i hated it enough to find out most cities only let the dead use the ground for 99 years then they dig them up and re-sell the plot .. unless the family re-buys the plot to keep the  person there..  but that usualy doesnt happen because most places cant or wont locate the families  to tell them ..so you cant go into a graveyard and read some names from 1800's .. and that sucks to .. you have to go to really old small towns to do that .. and they are disappearing also.. there tearing down all our old heritage homes .. or remodeling them to make them look new .. grrrrr  they all want new and bright and cheery .. all sunshine and lollipops .. yuck!!!  well we all dont like that !!!!.. dont get me wrong i am not even goth!!  and i am not depressed or dark .. i just like the night or cloudy  fogy days or a good thunder and lightning storm .. with lots of wind ..it relaxes me and makes me feel refreshed and full of energy ..i love the fall the best and the spring isnt to bad .. in b.c that is  i cant stand all that chirpy sunshine its to bright ..went outside today and almost got blinded .. it took fifteen minutes for my eyes to adjust to the light  i seriously couldnt see a thing  and my eyes were all watering ..i say leave our graveyards alone ..  our kids wont even know what a graveyard looks like if they keep wrecking them .. they will ask us why they look so funny in the halloween pics .. we will tell them  thats how they looked when we were young and they wont believe us ...

well decided not to paint the floors if i can clean them .. paid a relative to try and use acid to get them clean but nope didnt work ... then tried to hand scrape it  .. worked a little  now i am sanding them with a power sander . looks like its working ..after that i guess if it comes pretty much clean then i will clear coat it .. hope it works .. after all cheap peal and stick tiles are 0.49 cents each .. that works out to be over $350 .00  just for the floor  .. nope wont pay it ..

well  the shop is comming along pretty good so far  thanks for all the help to those that helped .. and thanks to amanda for helping with the paint  and to busty_midget for her labour .. and other help .. 
well i am way over budget as of the first doller i spent  hahaha the paint ended up being to pink .. .. and the trim didnt work even after five coats  .. because we neeeded a grey undercoat to it first .. so yup  had to change that .. i have lots of left over paint hahaha i was going to paint the floor grey and then clear coat instead of re- tile but .. i was informed  after buying the paint that it wouldn't hold .. even though the guy at general paint said it would .. so i did a couple of test squares and yup  it didnt hold  it chipped realy easy .. funny though i thought for sure it would work .. after all it is a floor paint .. but meh!!so i bought some floor stripper  and sometime this week i will find someone who knows how to strip floors  .. then i will clearcoat it .. that will work .. so i had to cover the trim wich ended up looking like burgandy  .. with the magenta that looked more bright pink then magenta  cause the shop was looking like valentines day threw up in there hahaha  .. so i bought some stuff that helps you work with the paint longer before it dry's and then i took the ceiling paint wich was a light grey  and mixed it 75-40 and started to roll it on with a roller and then dab the fresh paint with  paper .. and it looks great .. tommorow i will probably be finished with painting that, hopefully!....... the stuff comes in a realy small can, and its like twenty bucks even with amanda's discount .. i would have been tottaly screwed if she didnt help me with her discounts .. but anyways ..i am doing the whole shop like that and then keeping the tattoo rooms and the piercing room magenta .. its funny but only those rooms turned into a real magenta colour .. maybe its the lights  .. hmm maybe!!  .. i asked busty_midget if she could maybe do a mural .. but i am not sure i want one done .. maybe just the shop name painted .. but now i am thinking not just painted but airbrushed .. that may look even better ...what do you guys think?
i need a good used clean coach for the waiting erea . and maybe another chair .. and two or three barber chairs or preferably dental chairs  so if anyone has any leads let me know o.k maybe a couple of weeks and we will be open and running  .. cant wait .. thanks for everyones help so far .. 
and i never spell check so meh!!  deal with it hahahah

well things are going great with the renovations to my new tattoo shop .. but i need cheap drywall!! anyone know where to get realy cheap drywall or damaged drywall .. or if you have 30 sheets of drywall i will buy it from you or trade it for some piercings or tattoos.

sorry no drama here .. yay!!  just normal stuff
well i think i will be updateing more often now .. anyways .. the shop is leased and i will find out if the name approval has gone thru .. laura and i went searching for glass display cases  for the shop .. if anyone knows of any let us know please !!   this shop is so strange i dont  even know where to start  when it comes to renovating it .. and supplies are low .. haha  i want to get some of the renovations done before the alarm system and digital survalence  camera's are installed  so i know what angles to put them on .. one cool thing is the alarm is voice controled thru alarm force .. so they can hear everything thats going on if someone breaks in and they call me and the police .. and i am only a few blocks away .. its such a good deal for so little money .. insurance is going to be a pain .. i just know it .. well gotta run .. have to find those glass display cases  and some more lumber .. talk to you all soon

well once again its time for yet another of my boring updates . hahaha ****the journal calls to me to write in it ..
making me feel guilty like i am neglecting it !!  but the bad grammer and horrible spelling lets me feel justified in not posting . hahaha  ok that was just weird!!!  lmao. 
so anyways i am getting up so early now! it used to be i didnt get up until 2pm now i am up @ 8:30 am .. ughhh  but have to be at the  tattoo shop early .. i am working at 
tx.ink   its a tattoo studio .. on hastings street across from antons pasta about two blocks west of willingdon on the north side .... i tattoo and pierce there so its all good .. i'm the head piercer but third in line to do tattoos .. cause there is three other tattooist at the shop .. but i am ahead of tiggers apprentice .. for first choice of clients to tattoo .. things are a little slow there this week so we spend time tattooing each other .. hahaha  i might get a tree on the back of my neck today .. i was going to get it done yesterday .. but by the time we made new needles and laura and i had something to eat . then i was just to tired to get inked .. plus if you get tattooed when your tired it hurts a thousand times more .. well ok maybe not a thousand times more but at least 999 times more .. hahaha  well thats all for now  .. gotta fly of to work . you can still get work done here with me .. or you can go to the shop .. its a bit more at the shop though .. .. thats all for now ..

whoa, laura did -such- an awesome job changing the colours on my journal..
but i bet next time i see it ill end up wanting them changed again.


thanks so much, wednesday, you rock!

nuthing realy to exciting happened today  or for that matter  in a while .. i need to win the lottery .. hahah  .. hey how come those phsycics cant predict the lotto for themselfs  .. they say stuff like thats proffiting from a gift that was given . but they have no problem milking stupid people out of lots of cash to tell them false crap about themselfs .. 

come on everyone  .. tell me the ( HOW COME?? ) or (why???)
it will be fun reading

yay its that time again for the update ..things are going good .. had a nice time with a special someone .. i loved it .. even though she fell asleep after dinner for four hours .. hahaha  snore* snore* haha 
finaly got my black flash sheets done 160 new sheets of flash .. all black or grey designs .. now to do the line drawings .. i will do some and laura can do some .. she is now starting her tattoo aprentiship.. she is realy talented  everyone that knows her will agree.. .. and i finaly finished making my transfer light box .. $80 bucks later . haha  franken box ..lol.. its realy ugly .. but it works ..
so i am up and its 5am and i have tests at 9am for my stomach . damn ulcers .. haha i guess i will be zoned for that test . oh and i got a new tattoo on my leg by tigger .. i work in his shop also now .. and khaos wants me in his shop .. i dont know if i can juggle three shops .. but i will try .. and paul tattooed my left forearm to cover up that eagle and snake .. its just the lining so far .. but i like it .. its just so itchy .. more than usual cause its covering a scared tattoo .. i hate this part of the healing .. the scabs all gone but the itching is horrible .. AARRRRRGGGHHH
 well thats all the info for now .. more updates later .. hugs and kisses for everyone ..

well its that amazing time again .. when i decide to update my journal .. 
work is going great .. and i am working at a new tattoo shop and still doing my own thing . makes it hard to find any free time .. laura has the coolest new tattoo .. the new website will be up and running soon thanks to 
miss_tease
she is not only beautifull but talented as well .. gotta love her .. so thats all for now ..

well the other day laura asked me if i could do a piercing project for her for her school art class / project .. the teacher said it would be a cool idea .. well i did it and laura didnt even flintch.. she said it made her a bit stoned and gigled a lot . (well thats a strange laura for ya ) haha so anyways i pierced it and brad taped it and took some of the initial pictures . and alexis (mannequin) took some pics to .. alexises are the nicer pics what do you guys think?

well today was fun .. not!!  haha   six people cancled there appointments at the last minute  .. i hate when people do that .. its rude!! i dont make them leave a deposit  .. and so they take advantage of the situation ..  i mean realy  i would understand  if they said oh i didnt get paid .. or something came up i cant make it .. but when they dont show up and you have to call them and then they say .. oh ya  um  well i think i willl have to rebook ..  well guess what anyone cancles at the last minute or i have to call them to say where are you and then they say oh i cant make it .. then the next time  you book in .. then i am going to add lots more money to the price  of whatever you get done .. sounds fair  right!!  glad you all agree  .. haha  well thats all i have to vent about.. have a fun weekend

well heres the question...
i am going to poll this question    please everyone who reads this please respond to it   .. i hope others will post polls on this question also  as we  all have different lj freinds  and the post answers will be greater ..(valentines day)  this holliday was created by hallmark greeting cards if i am not mistaken ..  in the sixties .. maybe earlier .. i think in my opinion it takes away from the true meaning of a relationship  .. by asking us to place a day to celebrate  and show affection to our freinds and mates  ... and if we do not  ,, then its frowned upon .. in my opinion it creates stress  .. and adds commerce to local industry only  .. yes it is good for business .. but cheapons the meaning  ... we have enough  commercial hollidays..............   celebrating love  or appreciating a freind ship  such as gift giving should be done spontaneously.. to keep it special  .. in the cases of new love or relationship love ...... it would be celebrated  by a anniversary ..
so do we need to have a day to make gretting cards chocolate and florists richer?  ... and to remind those who dont have anyone .. or have lost loves or recently lost a love, or lost  freindship  feel lonelier or worse  ... i think not !!  this is only my opinion ...  lets hear from you  what do you think 
i have a lot of freinds and people who care for me dearly  and for that i am very thankfull....... but i cant help but feel badly for those who dont feel loved  ... remember  even if you feel lonely  there is someone always thinking  happy thoughts about you ...or maybe even wishing they could call you... or even just get to say hi to you .... maybe they see you on the bus .... and are afraid to say hi  .. maybe it was someone from elementary school wanting to find you to see how you are now  .. a high school crush that never was mentioned ... the point is no matter how bad you feel or how lonely you are remember there is always someone wanting to talk to you or say hi .. so the next time someone walks by even if there not looking at you  say hi and wish them well  small things like that can brighten a day  or even .. beleive it or not  save a life ..

yay  well thank  you  to all the people who made sugestions on what to get for a  new neon tatoo sign... but i went with laura's idea  and got the cherries .. its great it should be finished this week and i got it for a realy great deal .. its huge  i phoned around  and the cheapest i found was $3800 dollars 
but lets just say  i got it made for me cheaper  .. hahaha  .. i am so happy .. did you know  one of those open signs in neon .. a small one is $250 .. mine is worth $500  
wow ui cant wait to mount this thing .. happy happy joy joy .. well i still might use one of your guys other ideas  for the  piercing sign .. so you still might get a free piercing  .. if i use your idea..

ok here goes .. my spelling sucks realy bad .. so i apoligize in advance .. not to mention my punctuation .. lol

i am about to  say stuff i dont usualy tell people  .. why you ask ,, well let me tell you 
i have had some strange stuff happen to me thru my life ..  and this doesnt help ..
and i need to know if anyone else out there  can do the same thing .. or am i just a nut case ..
you will all think so after i say this .. but hey its about time i  talked about it and i am going to add a small storie of another strange thing that happened to me at the end of this .. so get ready to get out the straight jacket ..haha
well  sometimes  and i can never tell when !! i find myself  feeling things .. for example  .. when one of my clients is thinking of something,  its like i can feel what they are thinking/feeling... or if they are feeling dizzy so do i.. or sick  .. or  confused .. etc etc .. this has happened to me so many times i cant even count  .. sometimes when i am consetrating on my work and they are quiet i will come out and say something .. an answer to a question that they didnt even ask .. this has happened to lots of people  and some that people on here know, .. it happened once when i was tattooing cam .. i was doing his arm and he thought to himself where is laura ?
and i looked up and out loud said i dont know where she went  .. maybe she went into the bathroom .. well that kinda freaked him out .. he was like  hey buddy i didnt even say anything  but thats what i was thinking .. 
now dont get me wrong i didnt hear him say that i felt like i wanted to know where she was  .. in my own thoughts .. but i knew it wasnt mine it was his .. .. are you confused yet ?
this has happened all my life.. i was talking to a girl from, alberta .. and she had me on the webcam 
we talked about her freinds  and stuff  a little here and a little there .. then one night after a chat with her ; i left to go to the gym downtown .. as i was driving  i seen her in my mind .. stting at the computer  from my end  .. like i had seen her earlier .. then i seen a lady standing behind her .. she was completely in white .. but she was realy old and somehow i knew she was dead . and i knew her name .. i then had a huge flash of memory that only took a second and i knew everything that this girl had done for the last two weeks ..
so when i got home later on that night  i seen she was online .. well now here was a problem  .. do i tell her what i seen and we both laugh and she thinks i'm nuts  or does she just freak out .. maybe i should just not say anything 

well i decide to tell her everything i seen except .. that i knew the lady's name and that i knew  what she had done
so she seemed  calm enough and said thats funny  are you trying to scare me  .. by saying a dead woman is standing behind me .. so i was like no! .. this is her name .. its ieleen ... she said well my grandmothers name is ieleen .. i said is she dead .. she said no she is alive .. she said she lives in calgary ..   i am in reddear so its not that far .. i said no this grandmother  lives in ontario near a lake .. her name is ieleen   she was silent and said .. umm my dads mom is from ontario  and she lived near a lake  but i havnt seen her since  i was 5 years old ..
and she died a year ago ..... i said well i didnt see her standing behind you  when i was talking to you but as i was driving down robson street thinking about our conversation ,, i remebered seeing you on the web cam  and then i seen her ..
i said i knew everything she did for the last two weeks 
i said  lots of things about her  and she was amazed  .. but one thing confused me .. and she was anxious to find out what it was .. i said  your kitchen ,  is your kitchen yellow?
she was like yes . and i said if you stand in front of the counters  you can see the brown fridge to the right .. beside the back door   ... and she said ya .. and you have a glass screen door .. and a kitchen table   .  on the other side of the fridge .. she was like wow ya !!!.. and there is a small window above the sink with  white lace curtains .. and an off white counter with yelow stains ..  and she was like ya 
wow you just described my whole kitchen .. ok your freaking me out .. why are you telling me this .. i was like ok  this is what i seen and it confuses me!!  because its me seeing this but being something else who see's this and seeing it thru something else .. like i am viewing it thru the set of three diferent eyes using one set of eyes . you were standing at the counter last week and you were chopping something  and a cat rubbed against your legs and you cut yourself realy deep .. but didnt say anything to anyone and have been hiding it .. she couldnt respond .. i was like hello .. helloo  about three minutes went by .. and she said who are you .. where are you ?
i never told anyone about that .. i said your grandmother told me .. she sent the cat .. .. but it gets confusing because .. the cat didnt realy rub your legs did it!!  thats the part that bothers me,,, i cant figure it out! i am right but i am wrong .. she said  o.m.g  ... i was standing at the counter in the exact place you said .. and i was realy depressed and i was cutting my wrist ,, and my cat jumped up on the counter and started howling at me  like she was in pain.... so i started to cry  and stoped .. she has never been on the counters before  ........ i described her cat .. but i thought the cat was grey .. she says the cat is orange .. but when she showed me the cat on the webcam it looked grey  and had all the markings that i described it had .. we only talked a few  times after that .. it seemed like we didnt need to talk anymore .. she tried to keep talking to me  but it was like i shouldnt talk to her ......

something simular happened to me .. and laura .. not long after we met   and i have done this to her on several ocasions .. telling her about her family ... there ailments  and her relationships with each of them ..  describing her uncles and aunts  and grandmother .. and her ailments  troubles  and there good qualities.. i have always been dead on... i even told her about mike .. her ex.. boy friend .. what his house looked like inside and out .. what his family looked like how many pets .. described his part of the house .. described pictures on the walls .. where his family hangs .. what they talk about there habits .. his past relationships ..and that he cheated on her and described the girl he cheated on her with ..  you name it .. it was like i could feel what her memories were ..   you can all ask her if you want its all true .. i was dead on ... everything .. .. so i am only going to tell you guys about these couple of things  ..  man i could go on forever with stories .. about this kind of stuff  and what has happened .... it always feels while i am doing this  and after i do it .. that i have faked the whole thing ..  but i always get everything right !!  well almost everytime  but somepeople  wont admit to you when you are right ,, because you are exposing stuff that they find embarising or threatening ..  to sometimes find out you were right after all cause someone close to thenm said ya you were right  i dont know why they said you werent right .....so tell me  is there anyone who can do this???? ,, and do you feel like you are faking it also ??.. .. you can all delete me now if you want .. i wont blame you ..  but i had to get this off my chest and find out if i am alone ...... so if you all havnt laughed to hard  or deleted me .. then i will cary on with a storie that happened to me when i was 6 or 7......


so now my strange thing that happened to me ..
ok i was around six or seven and it was spring .. i believe  cause it wasnt to cold outside .. and i was living on the other side of richmond ..  directly across the street from the airport ..
i am the youngest of seven .. and everyone was out of the house  but myself and my mom.. and i was driving her crazy ..  telling her a was bored bored bored ..... it was around noon  .. and she was busy doing housework ..
she finaly got mad at me and told me to go outside and play .... we lived in a duplex  and had a   horseshoe   shaped drive way .. well i walked thru the living room and went out the front door .. the wood door was open and we had a glass door that had a lift up window  for ventilation ..   so i could see straight outside .. the living room window curtains were open and the room was fully iluminated with the sun .. 
so i walk outside  and walk down the three concrete stairs and accross the horseshoe shaped driveway . onto a patch of front lawn ..  near the ditch   at the edge of the lawn there was a dirt patch .. where we would play with our toys .... so i start  playing with my cars  and decide i would go inside and get my big truck   .. so i stand up , and walk across the lawn  and across the driveway and then walk up the three concrete steps  and reach for the front glass/screen door..  like i said before   you could see thru the door as it was glass and the living room window curtaines  were open so you could see in the living room perfectly and ther was no one inside the living room and i could see my mother in the the kitchen off to the left .. so i reach for the door  and start  to walk thru  .. once i get thru the door  i notice ,, that the living room is full of people  and the lights are all on ...   my brother then yells to my mom  here he is mom... well she comes running into the living room and shakes me and says where have you been?
we have been looking everywhere for you ... all these people and theres more out looking for you right now  .. i was completely confused .. where did all these people come from .. i just looked into the house thru the screen door a second ago and the house was empty...  and now its full of people .. ..well i tried to explain  the best i could that i  just went outside to play,, and that i was only gone for a second .. and that i came back in to get a truck .. but of course none of that actualy came out of my mouth  .. being seven  i was just ignored ,, my mother  was now trying to scold me  but also be polite and entertain the people who had  come to help search for me ... so anyways  still being confused about this i look over to the people sitting on the couch  and look straight out the window .. to see a most frightening thing .. especialy at seven years old!!! ... it was almost dark outside!!!  i turned quickly  and looked out the screen door  and then opened it and yes it was true it was almost dark .. the time was now around or after 8pm .. when i went outside it was noon and i was only out for a minute or two.. before walking back into the house .. somehow some where  eight hours of my life went missing from the time i tried to open the front screen door untill the time i walked thru ... to me it was instatanious .. for the people around me hours had passed without a trace of me to be found .... 
well thats one of the strange things that hapened to me ..  maybe if there is anyone left reading this .. i will tell you about another strange thing some time ...

well i guess its time i updated this thing ..hahah  and for all of you that might read this ... if you dont like the spelling then dont do the reading .. hahah  no offence intended .. 
well the last couple of days were perfect .. with exception to me being moody  i have been pms ing  a lot lately  .. hmm   i dont know whats wrong with me .. maybe its boredom .. i love to work .. and i have been busy  .. but never busy enough ... maybe when my shop opens  i will be realy busy ... then i can work myself to death ... i have i.b.s  wich doesnt help my moods any ...  if i dont eat i get all dizzy  and weird  and if i do eat the same thing .. so its a no win  situation .. more trips to the gym .. and a healthier diet maybe .. well anyways  besides  me being a grump   it was a great weekend .. i spent it with a very special lady   .. who i hold extremely dear to my heart ... dont get me wrong .. i love all my friends  but this one is very special ... she makes me smile everytime i look at her .. even though i may not show it  .. i feel so complete when she is around .. she makes me feel like everything i do is perfect  .. and that i have no flaws .. but thats far from the truth...i have lots of flaws .. but it sure is nice to know you are loved  that much ... i am trying to figure out what kind of design  to use  for my new neon sign ... laura says  i should use cherries  and  a banner running thru it ,, saying tattoo  .. i like it but i am not sure..  i downloaded some nautical stars  . and thought maybe flames around it and a banner .. i want something  looking  like old school  . tattoo art .. but it has to be a simple design .. so it can be done in neon tube .... if anyone reads this  ,, and can think of anything  ..   and sends me a pic .. if i use it i will give you a free piercing .. hows that sound .. well i should get back to drawing  and stuff.. love you all .. even the ones who dont love me !!  share your life and love your friends  ..   and forgive your enimies  .. its easier to hate than to love ..   *i love the saying *  when you came into this world  you were crying and everyone around you was smiling ... live your life so when you die  you are smiling and everyone that has known you is crying
